name: Sapphire human solutions
description: Sapphire Human Solutions is one of the premier retained executive search firms in India. Founded in 2008, we have grown rapidly to become one of the most trusted names for leadership hiring. This has been achieved due to our unending quest for excellence, best in class client service and consistent delivering of value, search after search. Sapphire Human Solutions has been founded on basic tenet of creating value. We believe that we can create tremendous value for our clients by partnering with them to hire the right talent for their companies using our customized leadership hiring solutions, help our candidates create value in their careers by assisting them with our expert advice in making right career choices, and, in the process create value for ourselves by growing along with our clients and candidates. No wonder, so many of our candidates end up becoming our clients.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Leadership is our business. We bring strategic thinking and a hands-on approach to help organizations build their critical leadership talent

enhanced_description: Sapphire Human Solutions, founded in 2008, is a premier retained executive search firm in India, specializing in critical leadership talent acquisition. They offer customized solutions designed to help organizations build strong leadership teams, including Executive Search, placement of Independent Directors, and strategic advisory services through CXO Roundtables. Their approach is focused on creating value for clients by facilitating the hiring of the right talent more efficiently and cost-effectively, and for candidates by providing expert career guidance, fostering strong, enduring relationships.
